Room.Name: Lelion Way/Apple Orchid
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Lelion Way just north of an old apple orchid.
Room.LongDescription: An incredibley beautiful apple orchid is guarded by a small wooden fence on the south side of Lelion Way, while the forest on the north provides a home for a number of wood creatures and folk. Rumors in the city speak of odd happenings in the forest, and not all of them good things. Some say a great wizard makes his summer home in the forest.
